adept.serialization

Class AbstractSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.serialization.AbstractSerializer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryFromJSONSerializer, JSONSerializer, XMLSerializer

    public abstract class AbstractSerializer
extends Object
    Abstract class for serialization that enforces a srialization type to be specified. Must be extended by all serializer class implementations.
